metadata.title: CVE-2009-1183 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
The JBIG2 MMR decoder in Xpdf 3.02pl2 and earlier, CUPS 1.3.9 and earlier,Poppler before 0.10.6, and other products allows remote attackers to causea denial of service (infinite loop and hang) via a crafted PDF file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2009-1183` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-poppler-0.18 - 0.10.5-1ubuntu2
libpoppler-cpp0v5 - 0.10.5-1ubuntu2
libpoppler-glib8 - 0.10.5-1ubuntu2
libpoppler-qt5-1 - 0.10.5-1ubuntu2
libpoppler90 - 0.10.5-1ubuntu2
poppler-utils - 0.10.5-1ubuntu2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: poppler package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.10.5-1ubuntu2').
